ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Redshift an additive model. XSpec convolution model *Experimental*.

DESC.PARA: This convolution model redshifts an additive model. It takes the calculated model and shifts energies by 1/(1+z) then applies an additional 1/(1+z) factor to the model values.
Please see ahelp xsconvolve for information on how to load the model.

LIST.CAPTION: Notes
LIST.ITEM: This is an experimental release of the convolution models; please take care when using this model.
Sherpa does not have an equivalent of the extend command in X-Spec.

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.10.0e of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.11.
The power-law and gaussian components are redshifted and then an absorption model is applied.

ADESC.title: About Contributed Software
ADESC.PARA: This script is not an official part of the CIAO release but is made available as "contributed" software via the CIAO scripts page. Please see this page for installation instructions - such as how to ensure that the parameter file is available.
